lead_paragraph: A picture caption on Monday with an article on the Mets’ 3-2 win against the Florida Marlins carried an incorrect identification from Getty Images in some editions for the Mets player shown batting. It was Fernando Martinez, not Angel Pagan.
snippet: A picture caption on Monday with an article on the Mets’ 3-2 win against the Florida Marlins carried an incorrect identification from Getty Images in some editions for the Mets player shown batting. It was Fernando Martinez, not Angel Pagan.
